reviews.text:
I went here on bank holiday for a soft play session for my little one. Come november, i booked her birthday party there and i was great!

I like their soft play area because it doesnt seem cluttered and you get a bit of everything-soft play equipment for gross motor movement both for toddlers and crawlers; shelves filled with different toys like puzzles, musical instruments, etc and also get a section of the play space for role play. It was worth the price for the amount of things your child can do and try during your booked time.

It also gave me some peace of mind that all the toys were being cleaned prior every session and some of them are changed after. We are only allowed one parent to be with the child but understable given covid restrictions.

I booked a pLay session and party in their den room. It was easy to communicate with them my requests and i had no problems during the day apart from there is no parking. My party was safari themed and they did an amazing job of decorating the space (in a short amount of time as there was a session before it) and went with the theme i requested. There were also safari themed toys for the kids to enjoy while there.

Thanks for making my little girls party an memorable one.

Lovely cafe and soft play. Brought our two kids (3yo and 1yo) for the first time last weekend and they enjoyed the soft play area very much. The staff were very friendly and chatted with us, making us feel welcomed. After each soft play session, the staff went in to clean and packed the toys back neatly, all in an efficient manner. The cafe also supports local artists by selling their artwork placed on the wall, which is nice. We will be back!

Elaine and the team at Tiny Tigers made sure my 2 year old’s birthday party was a big hit. She and the team are very helpful and understand the needs of kids and parents. They understood the theme of the party and helped decorate the Den accordingly. Their soft play area is very spacious and includes variety of activities to keep the kids engaged for 1 hour. The Den was very well maintained and decorated by the lovely staff at Tiny Tigers. The team were involved with us in our requirements for the party and on the event day helped us various things like decorations, food setup and post event clean up.
Thank you once again Tiny Tigers for making my daughter’s birthday party memorable. We absolutely recommend Tiny Tigers not only for parties but also their drop-in sessions, soft play and the lovely café.

Our child absolutely loves coming here. There is a tremendous selection of toys, the most comfortable and safe slide of all the soft plays we have visited, and a very nice cafe with really good coffee. The space is not large but there is so much to do that the hour flies by very quickly and the children don’t get bored. Everything also feels very clean, and there is a convenient space to park prams and to change babies.

Elaine and the crew at Tiny Tigers put on the most amazing party for my 2 year old daughter. They made us feel part of their family and nothing was too much trouble. The little touches such as providing a bubble machine in their party room or some soft mats and some baby toys for my other 3month old daughter made all the difference. It shows that Tiny Tigers really understand children and they are passionate about adults and children alike enjoying themselves. The food that they provided was beautiful and the prices were reasonable too.

I would highly recommend and will be back.

address: Unit 1, South Quay Plaza, 185 Marsh Wall, London E14 9SH, United Kingdom
